details.description: As an employer, if you provide company cars or fuel for your employees' private use, you'll need to work out the value for tax and reporting purposes.
details.alternative_title: Company car and fuel benefit calculator
details.body:
As an employer, if you provide company cars or fuel for your employees’ private use, you’ll need to work out the value for tax and reporting purposes.

You can do this by using:

  • HMRC’s PAYE Online services
  • Basic PAYE Tools
  • company car and car fuel benefit calculator
  • commercial payroll software

The taxable value of a car is not the same as its cost. The taxable value also depends on:

  • the amount of time the car is available during the tax year
  • the car’s fuel type and level of CO2 emissions

‘Private use’ includes employees’ journeys between home and work, unless they’re travelling to a temporary place of work.
